summary:
Tony: One order of waffles, please.
McDonald's Employee: We don't have waffles.
Tony: Then poke holes in pancakes??? Honestly,...
body:
Tony: One order of waffles, please.
McDonald's Employee: We don't have waffles.
Tony: Then poke holes in pancakes??? Honestly, do I have to do everything around here?
Stephen: I don't know him.

dialogue.label: Tony:
dialogue.phrase: Then poke holes in pancakes??? Honestly, do I have to do everything around here?

summary: Marvel Comics Namor vs. Iron Man Hat Rack
title: Marvel Comics Namor vs. Iron Man Hat Rack
excerpt: This coat/hat rack is the only one of its kind anywhere in the world. It features a Marvel Comics battle between the Invincible Iron Man and Namor the Sub-Mariner. The hat rack is wrapped in the pages of issue #120 of the Invincible Iron Man and features the incredible artwork of Bob Layton.
description: @fuckyeahrichardiii I feel like this was made for you in particular

reblog.comment: @fuckyeahrichardiii I feel like this was made for you in particular

blog.name: earth-best-defender
blog.title: Scott Lang, Savior of the Universe
blog.description: Hi I'm Kaz but most people call me idiot || 21 || she/her || Portugal || Pan+Ace || I like writing so please buy me a coffee? || Commissions: [To be open soon] || AO3 || Tony Stark stan first and Scott Lang stan second || Scotty saved the MCU || Caesar Zeppeli, Jotaro Kujo and Risotto Nero protection and appreciation squad || Taken by the Pepper of my life ♡

body:
Here’s to them!

  • To Natasha that sacrificed herself not knowing if they succeeded and all she got was a mocking of a funeral and never was respectfully mourned by the others after the big battle
  • To Bruce and the Hulk, that are separate identities on their own and are amazing and deserved to be seen as such
  • To Thor who gained weight and struggled with depression but was still brave and worthy and fought on
  • To Steve who was a man out of his time but adapted to the times and made new friendships and gained a new family but apparently abandoned them and returned to a time that actually is not his, to a life that belongs to the Steve that was frozen and to a Peggy that is also not his
  • To Tony that died for the universe and will never get to fully enjoy his happiness with his wife and see his little girl grow up and so much more that I could go on about
  • To Peter Quill that even though Gamora is back, it’s not his Gamora. Not the Gamora he mourned for and she’ll never remember what they went through with the rest of the Guardians
  • To Rhodey who’s spot got stolen and did not get to be the one to support Tony when he was brought back from space
  • To Vision that never got to return also meaning that Jarvis died for real, no little part or half or whatever part was there of him inside of Vision. May they both rest alongside with their creator, their father Tony Stark
  • To Edwin Jarvis that deserved to get some attention from Tony more than Howard did even though I understand the scene was about Tony getting closure but Tony’s real dad deserved that hug
  • To Loki whose sun never got to shine on him and never got to receive Thor’s hug. We’ll most likely never see him again right when we were finally seeing him the trickster he is and is finally healing as well

And others I’m probably forgetting, I apologize for that… You and everyone else is loved and I know we cannot please everyone with the ending but you still deserved better than what you got. Specially when it feels like the most wronged ones are the pillars, the core and heart of this universe.

We’ll forever love you 3000 ❤️ Thank you for everything

summary:
Tony: Stephen wake up!
Stephen: *groaning* What?
Tony: I love you~
Stephen:.....did you really have wake me up to say...
body:
Tony: Stephen wake up!

Stephen: *groaning* What?

Tony: I love you~

Stephen:…..did you really have wake me up to say that?

Tony: yes, okay now I can sleep knowing I told you.

summary:
Okay
But did you notice?
He said: "He killed my mom."
He didn't say "He killed my parents." or "He killed mom and dad."
Just...
body:
Okay

But did you notice?

He said: “He killed my mom.”

He didn’t say “He killed my parents.” or “He killed mom and dad.”

Just mom…

I mean I knew he had a bad relationship with his dad, but I never expected it to be this bad…

I don’t know

It just makes me really sad…

reblog.comment:
Okay

He said: “He killed my mom.”

He didn’t say “He killed my parents.” or “He killed mom and dad.”

Just mom…

I mean I knew he had a bad relationship with his dad, but I never expected it to be this bad…

I don’t know

It just makes me really sad…

summary:
Tony, Stephen, and peter:*finally arrive to meeting*
Fury: about time you three showed up
Peter: sorry I had homework 
Stephen:...
body:
Tony, Stephen, and peter:*finally arrive to meeting*

Fury: about time you three showed up

Peter: sorry I had homework

Stephen: and we were helping him finish it

Tony: actually me wouldn’t let me do the kid’s homework so we spent an hour debating about that

Fury: well that was two hours ago, did you get it done

Tony, Stephen, and Peter: no.

blog.name: consensualanarchy
blog.title: Everyone live life the way you choose
blog.description: Just let others do the same

summary: why didnt captain marvel use the gauntlet to blast thanos and everyone? was tony using it just a cool/poetic way to have rdj out...
body: why didnt captain marvel use the gauntlet to blast thanos and everyone? was tony using it just a cool/poetic way to have rdj out of the mcu, instead of retiring back to his cabin with his family? i dont get why he had to die, except for a fitting narrative but makes no sense

reblog.comment: why didnt captain marvel use the gauntlet to blast thanos and everyone? was tony using it just a cool/poetic way to have rdj out of the mcu, instead of retiring back to his cabin with his family? i dont get why he had to die, except for a fitting narrative but makes no sense

blog.description: FBI man, you know I’m single right?

summary: I don’t watch Game of Thrones
body:
I don’t watch Game of Thrones

But is there a character named Stark in it?

Cause everyone seems to be talking about a Stark but I feel like they are talking about a different Stark and not IronMan Tony Stark

Which makes things a bit confusing at this particular time

title: Tony and Steve
body:
Even if I am still crying a river over Avengers Endgame I believe these two had the best end possible.

Tony, a man no one believed at the beginning was capable of heroism and deserving the title of Avengers or capable of sacrifice, died a true hero (crying as crazy right now), near the love of his life.

Steve, a man out of his time, that said he did not really believe himself capable of living without war, or having a family got the chance to have a fullfilling life next to the love of his life
